text: The Misa () is a river in the Marche region of Italy. It runs for over 48 kilometres through the region. The source of the river lies south of Arcevia in the province of Ancona. The river flows northeast near Serra de' Conti, Ostra Vetere and Ostra. The river is joined by the Nevola before entering the Adriatic Sea near Senigallia. ==References== Category:Rivers of the Province of Ancona Category:Rivers of Italy Category:Adriatic Italian coast basins
title: Misa (river in Italy)
